Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class UndoHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.CareTaker
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.UndoHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class UndoHandler
extends CareTaker
implements java.lang.Runnable
Thread that save the state of the game, sleep for 5 second and when wake up check if the client asked for the undo option.
If true restore the previous state on the game, else does nothing
See Also:
CareTaker
